scripts.prebuild: cat fixed-blanks.json | sed "s/VERSION/`json -f package.json version`/" > blanks.json.tmp
scripts.build: commonform render --title 'Obvious Nondisclosure Agreement' --blanks blanks.json.tmp --format docx < agreement.commonform > agreement.docx
scripts.postbuild: if [ "$SIGN_RELEASE" = true ] ; then gpg --detach-sign --local-user 'Obvious NDA Releases' agreement.docx ; fi
scripts.test: commonform lint < agreement.commonform && commonform critique < agreement.commonform
